curved_or_warped_walls.description: Large foreground structures appear heavily curved and stretched, not matching real-world planar walls.

misaligned_edges.description: Edges between floor and wall/sofa show noticeable misalignment and jagged transitions.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Severe depth cues are inconsistent; foreground dominates with abrupt transitions to background black area, depth cues unreliable.

ghosting.description: Soft duplications and smeared textures near the large foreground blur.

floating_artifacts.description: Isolated bright streaks and patches not anchored to geometry.

over_blur.description: Extensive blur obscures fine details, especially in the foreground.

texture_inconsistency.description: Inconsistent surface textures between floor, chair, and wall regions.

image_details.summary: The rendering shows major geometric and texture inconsistencies: warped foreground structures, misaligned edges, unstable depth relations, and pervasive blur/ghosting artifacts. Overall realism is limited; the scene is not a reliable reconstruction of a real 3D environment.

curved_or_warped_walls.description: Walls and ceiling exhibit pronounced bending and warping, particularly near the corners and along the ceiling lines.

misaligned_edges.description: Edges of furniture and architectural elements appear slightly misaligned or smeared, especially around doorway frames and cabinet fronts.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Overall depth cues are inconsistent; some surfaces appear stretched or compressed altering perceived distance.

ghosting.description: faint trailing/ghost-like artifacts around edges and high-contrast transitions.

floating_artifacts.description: small disconnected patches of texture appear detached from surfaces, giving a floating look.

over_blur.description: excessive blur smears fine details across large areas such as walls and furniture.

texture_inconsistency.description: inconsistent texturing across surfaces (varying sharpness and grain) without physical justification.

image_details.summary: The rendering shows a plausible room layout but with strong geometric distortions and pervasive texture artifacts. Warped walls, smeared edges, depth inconsistencies, and ghosted textures prevent it from being a faithful reconstruction of a real scene. Improvements should focus on correcting perspective geometry, reducing excessive blur, and stabilizing texture transitions to restore spatial coherence.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Slight parallax/perspective inconsistencies near the window edges and along the table depth, affecting precise depth cues.

over_blur.description: Overall painterly blur/softening across surfaces, reducing fine texture sharpness.

texture_inconsistency.description: Inconsistent surface textures (soft painterly look on walls vs. sharper foreground objects) typical of stylized renderings.

image_details.summary: The scene presents a structurally coherent dining room with plausible geometry and layout. Minor depth/perspective cues are slightly inconsistent, and the overall texture is intentionally stylized, causing reduced sharpness and some texture inconsistency across surfaces. No major geometric defects detected, but depth cues and surface detail fidelity are somewhat compromised by the rendering style.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Subtle depth/perspective inconsistencies around the table and chairs, and some perspective warp near the back wall where the artwork meets the cabinet.

ghosting.description: faint ghost-like trails/ghosting in high-contrast regions and around edges.

over_blur.description: overall soft focus/over-blurring of fine textures, especially on furniture and walls.

texture_inconsistency.description: inconsistent surface textures between materials (wood/table vs. upholstery) leading to unrealistic transitions.

image_details.summary: The scene is recognizable as a dining room reconstruction with coherent layout and object placement. However, geometric depth cues show minor inconsistencies and several texture-related artifacts reduce realism (ghosting, over-blur, and texture inconsistency). Overall structure is plausible, but not perfectly indistinguishable from a real photograph.

curved_or_warped_walls.description: Notable curvature and irregularities along the left wall and ceiling area, giving a distorted geometry impression.

misaligned_edges.description: Slight misalignment at some panel edges and seams, especially near the back wall and wall decorations.

over_blur.description: Overall soft focus/blur in many regions, reducing sharpness of textures.

image_details.summary: The rendering presents a recognizably indoor conference-room scene with plausible furniture layout and lighting. However, geometric distortions (curved/warped walls and misaligned edges) and pervasive soft blur reduce realism and affect structural accuracy. Textures are generally well represented but lack of sharpness and minor inconsistencies reduce perceptual fidelity. Overall, a mostly realistic reconstruction with notable geometric and texture quality limitations.

curved_or_warped_walls.description: Left wall/nearby surfaces show irregular, non-rectilinear warping and jagged edge treatment.

ghosting.description: Subtle ghosting around high-contrast edges and seams.

over_blur.description: Overall soft blur reduces sharpness, especially on mid and far surfaces.

texture_inconsistency.description: Inconsistent texture detail across walls and furniture; some areas look smeared.

image_details.summary: The rendering forms a recognizable interior scene with plausible layout and lighting, but exhibits notable geometric irregularities in surfaces (notably left-side walls), along with texture inconsistencies and overall blur. These factors reduce realism and indicate reconstruction artifacts that diverge from a true real-world capture.

curved_or_warped_walls.description: Prominent warping along the left wall and door region; vertical straight lines appear distorted, suggesting curved geometry or perspective distortion.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Overall depth cues are inconsistent in some areas (foreground furniture edges not aligning cleanly with background). Some parts appear stretched due to aggressive processing.

ghosting.description: Subtle ghosting around high-contrast edges, especially on the black wall panel and near the doorway.

over_blur.description: Significant blur on mid-ground furniture and wall textures, reducing sharpness of details.

texture_inconsistency.description: Inconsistent texture fidelity across surfaces (wood, fabric, and paint show varying granularity) with some smeared areas.

image_details.summary: The rendering shows a plausible interior scene but exhibits notable geometric distortions (curved/warped walls and depth inconsistencies) and texture artifacts (blur, ghosting, and uneven texture fidelity). These issues reduce realism and indicate moderate reconstruction errors typical of aggressive 3D Gaussian Splatting results. Minor geometry and alignment issues prevent it from being indistinguishable from a real scene.

curved_or_warped_walls.description: Multiple wall planes appear curved and warped, especially along the vertical wall segments; geometry does not align with a typical rectilinear room.

misaligned_edges.description: Edges near doorway and wall joints do not meet cleanly; noticeable tearing/offsets along panel edges.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Depth cues are inconsistent; foreground and background planes do not maintain stable perspective, contributing to a skewed spatial interpretation.

floating_artifacts.description: Unclear speckled/line artifacts floating over surfaces, not attached to geometry.

over_blur.description: Significant blur smears detail across large regions, reducing texture fidelity.

texture_inconsistency.description: Texture quality varies abruptly between adjacent surfaces, with inconsistent shading and detail.

image_details.summary: The rendering exhibits strong geometric instability with warped walls, misaligned edges, and depth inconsistencies that undermine spatial coherence. Texture details are inconsistent and smeared, resulting in noticeable artifacts that reduce realism and multi-surface consistency.

curved_or_warped_walls.description: Several wall planes appear warped and skewed, with distorted straight lines (e.g., vertical panels and doorway edges) suggesting geometry misalignment.

misaligned_edges.description: Edges where wall panels and furniture meet do not align cleanly; noticeable gaps and misfits along vertical/horizontal seams.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Depth cues are inconsistent; perspective lines do not converge realistically, giving a warped sense of space.

ghosting.description: Subtle ghost-like duplicates along textures, particularly on large flat surfaces.

floating_artifacts.description: Random stray strokes/lines appear detached from surfaces, floating in space.

over_blur.description: Regions show excessive blur smearing texture details, reducing sharpness.

texture_inconsistency.description: Inconsistent texture resolution across surfaces; some areas look smeared while others are detailed.

image_details.summary: The rendering shows notable geometric and textural inconsistencies typical of challenging 3DGS reconstructions: warped walls, misaligned edges, and depth errors combine with multiple texture artifacts (ghosting, floating strokes, over-blur). Overall realism is limited; reconstruction fails to convincingly replicate real-world spatial geometry, though some scene elements remain recognizable.

curved_or_warped_walls.description: Many walls appear irregular and rubbery with visible distortions around the vertical surfaces, suggesting warped geometry.

misaligned_edges.description: Edges of doorways and panels do not align cleanly; some corners appear skewed or offset.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Depth cues are inconsistent; perspective lines diverge oddly, giving a non-realistic depth relationship between foreground and background.

ghosting.description: Faint translucent echoes around large flat surfaces and along edges, typical of multi-view fusion artifacts.

over_blur.description: Certain regions appear overly smooth, reducing fine texture details (e.g., walls and floor).

texture_inconsistency.description: Texture quality varies across surfaces; some areas look blurred while others retain edges, inconsistent with lighting.

image_details.summary: The rendering shows noticeable geometric distortions and depth inconsistencies, with mixed texture fidelity and visible fusion-related artifacts. Overall it behaves like a rough reconstruction with several structural and textural irregularities, not yet convincing as a real-world indoor scene.

curved_or_warped_walls.description: Numerous walls and vertical panels show pronounced curvature and bending, especially near the right-side wall and doorway frames.

misaligned_edges.description: Edges of walls and door frames appear misaligned and jagged, contributing to a non-realistic geometry.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Depth cues are inconsistent; perspective appears skewed likely from artifacts rather than true scene geometry.

ghosting.description: Subtle ghosting around high-contrast edges and circular marker, indicative of multi-view blending artifacts.

over_blur.description: Overall softness and motion-like blur reduce sharpness of textures, especially on foreground surfaces.

texture_inconsistency.description: Texture continuity is erratic; surfaces look stretched or smeared in multiple regions.

image_details.summary: The render exhibits severe geometric distortions (curved, misaligned walls; distorted depth cues) and noticeable texture/appearance artifacts (ghosting, over-blur, inconsistent textures). These issues significantly reduce realism and structural reliability as a real-scene reconstruction. Minor surface details are present, but overall quality is insufficient for accurate 3D reconstruction assessment.

curved_or_warped_walls.description: Numerous subtle warps and scribble-like distortions across walls and near door frames, giving a warped geometry impression.

misaligned_edges.description: Edges at doorway frames and panel boundaries do not align cleanly, contributing to a jumbled silhouette.

depth_or_perspective_errors.description: Depth cues are inconsistent in transitional areas (e.g., hallway to room) leading to a questionable sense of scale and perspective.

floating_artifacts.description: A prominent circular white ring in the center and stray scribbles/lines give the impression of floating markers or overlays.

over_blur.description: Overall softness and motion-like blur reduces texture sharpness, especially on walls and floor.

texture_inconsistency.description: Varied texture density across surfaces (some very smooth, some highly scribbled) indicate inconsistent reconstruction textures.

image_details.summary: The rendering shows recognizable interior structure but with noticeable geometric distortions and inconsistent textures. Warped walls, misaligned edges, and depth inconsistencies reduce realism. A prominent central ring artifact and overall blur contribute to the sense of a flawed reconstruction rather than a faithful real scene.

vlm_analysis.summary: The rendering shows major geometric and texture inconsistencies: warped foreground structures, misaligned edges, unstable depth relations, and pervasive blur/ghosting artifacts. Overall realism is limited; the scene is not a reliable reconstruction of a real 3D environment.
